actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT sova_id as sovaId, log_date as date, meal_type as mealType, log_time as logTime, meal_image AS mealImage, MLD.meal_id as mealId, comment_id AS commentId, comment_notes AS commentNotes, comment_publisher AS commentPublisher, MFP.food_id as foodId, serving_size as servingSize, quantity, name, protein, fat, carbohydrate, fibre, url
           fROM ( SELECT sova_id, log_date, meal_type, meal_id, meal_image, log_time
            FROM MEAL_LOG_DATA
            WHERE sova_id='{{Profiles_Table.selectedRow.sova_id}}' AND log_date between CAST('{{mealLogDatePicker.formattedDate}}' AS DATE) AND CAST('{{mealLogDatePicker.formattedDate}}' AS DATE) )  AS MLD 
            INNER JOIN MEAL_FOOD_MAPPING AS MFP
            ON MLD.meal_id = MFP.meal_id
            INNER JOIN FOOD_MACROS_DATA AS FMD 
            ON MFP.food_id = FMD.food_id
            LEFT JOIN MEAL_LOG_COMMENTS AS MLC
            ON MLD.meal_id = MLC.meal_id
